title: I Still Dont Have My Riot Points That I Get Around Level 6
body: Hey Guys Can Anyone Help Me Or Tell Me What Level I Get It in.

replies.body: You no longer receive RP at level 3, instead you receive a [Hextech Chest.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp) that includes an Ashe champion shard, a Garen champ shard, and enough essence to craft both of them. We’re also including a semi-random skin shard for either Garen (Sanguine) or Ashe (Sherwood).
To add on to this, you actually receive this at level 5 now instead of level 3. I looked into this and confirmed that OP has already received their chest and key from level 5.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QRH8qJ0n,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-11T21:32:28.245+0000)
>
> an Ashe champion shard, a Garen champ shard, and enough essence to craft both of them

don't actually perm them, that's a terrible use of both the shards and essence.
